values.description: Parameters are project variables that your algorithm uses to define the value of internal variables like indicator arguments or the length of lookback windows.
values.keywords: overfitting, Look-Ahead Bias, parameter optimization, backtesting
values.og:description: Parameters are project variables that your algorithm uses to define the value of internal variables like indicator arguments or the length of lookback windows.
